issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.title: VIP过滤器
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

网站上可能会有部分提示登陆的内容。过滤它们，但不过滤网站预设好的常规登录渠道。请看图片，截图来源于iqiyi.com，我使用黄色的笔圈出来的内容不要过滤，但是过滤红笔圈出来的内容
![Uploading 意见.png…]()


### Proposed solution

创建一个过滤器，拦截有关于登陆的类似内容，但是千万不要过滤网站预设的登录窗口

### Additional information

_No response_

> it promotes persianblocker.

Only users who have the list enabled will see that.
Because the site is being update daily, users might get into problems if their list is outdated (@zloyden said AdGuard updates the lists after 4 days).

>the comment section isn't showing because it requires accepting cookies and if you click on the text nothing happens

Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

>also the amount of likes next to the popular articles is blocked

These "likes" are share buttons so are blocked by AdGuard Social Media filter.

issue.title: www.eurocontrol.int
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.eurocontrol.int/info/privacy-and-website-terms-use](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eurocontrol.int%2Finfo%2Fprivacy-and-website-terms-use) ### Comment > When I click on the "Give my consent" button, it visually changes as expected (to "Withdraw my consent"). However, in reality it generates a console error and the change in settings is not saved. Consequently, if I then click on "Withdraw my consent", the button doesn't change back because there's just another console error and no settings change. If I refresh the page, naturally, we're back to the initial state ("Give my consent") because the change in settings was never saved. ### Screenshots

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@yokoffing Hi. 
This issue is caused by the rule from EasyPrivacy filter, but was fixed in our `AdGuard Tracking Protection` filter(a long time ago)
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/501905359f9f07dfdf53b457d980c25232e86014
Please enable it again. Third-party filter authors usually support desktop browsers only(Firefox and Chromium based).
Also Base filter is disabled on your device. We fix many platform-related issues in this filter.
If you prefer to not using AdGuard filters, we cannot help you.

issue.title: AdGuard extension making Firefox too slow/laggy
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.0.204

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://translate.google.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

AdGuard is making translate.google.com too slow, I cannot reproduce issue with similar add-on "uBlock Origin".

My video proving this on fresh firefox profile
https://streamable.com/9o7bzz

I hope you can reproduce it, but if you cant, any idea what it could be?


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: I have no vintage pc to check it:) I see no difference. Which rule causes it?
